metadata.description: Yamaguchi and Takagari have recently moved from close friends to boyfriends... All is well, but Yamaguchi is worried. Takagari seems to love him...too much?! That in itself wouldn't be a bad thing at all, if it wasn't for the fact everybody else might find out they're a couple! A striking tale of hidden love!
metadata.name: Love Circumstances, Vol. 1
